bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LV (Nos 3777-3821)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.note: P. Oxy. LV, 3777-3821. - P. 183: Dedication on behalf of Tiberius, Livia and their domus, to Heracles Callinicus and Ammon in the Small Oasis.
bibl.seg: Rea John R., The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LV (Nos 3777-3821). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 75.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1988, 8°, xxii-259 pp. et VIII pll.
P. Oxy. LV, 3777-3821. - P. 183: Dedication on behalf of Tiberius, Livia and their domus, to Heracles Callinicus and Ammon in the Small Oasis.

C.R. par Hélène Cuvigny, REG 103 (1990) pp. 295-297. - Giuliana Foti Talamanca, Iura 39 (1988 [1991]) pp. 242-248. - Rosa Giannattasio Andria, Eikasmos 1 (1990) pp. 257-260. - Ann Ellis Hanson, Gnomon 62 (1990) pp. 273-275. - Ranon Katzoff, BASP 25 (1988) pp. 157-168. - D.W. Rathbone, CR N.S., 41 (1991) pp. 203-205 (concerne aussi P. Oxy. LVI). - Hans-Albert Rupprecht, ZSav 109 (1992) pp. 592-599 (concerne aussi P. Oxy. LIV; LVI; LVII).
